title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are applied immediately.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: 2. The changes from the working set are not applied immediately upon removal of the working set.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered. 
2. Remove the working set and verify that the changes from the working set are not immediately applied to the package view.
